reason.tex: %text Degrees and radians are not the only units for measuring angles But they are the most common ones Now, \underline\text{two right angles $= 180^\circ = \pi$ radians} Hence, \[\qquad x^\circ = \left(\frac{x}{180}\right)\cdot\pi radians \] Conversely, \[ \qquad y \text{ radians} = \left( \frac{y}\pi\right)\cdot 180^\circ\] %
